verses.content: Hieng ang hin Lalpa PATHIEN chun a mîn entir a, chun, en ta u, nisapuithei bâwm a lo nih.

Chun, ama chun, “Amos, ieng am i hmuh a?” a ta. Keiin, “Nisapuithei bâwm,” ka tih a. Chun, LALPA chun ka kuomah, “Ka mi Israelhai chungah tâwpna a hung tlung tah; anni chu khêl nâwk ta naw ning,” a ta.
Lalpa PATHIEN chun, “Chu nia chun biekin hlahai chu khêk rak rak ni tâng a ta, mithi ruong tam a ta, hmun tinah to zingin peihâwn an tih,” a ta.
Chun, hi hi ngai ta u, nangni tlasamhai fa zo nuom a, ram mi rimsi sukbo nuomhai,

“Bu ei zawr theina dingin thla thar chu iengtik âm bo a ta, beiphit bu ei insuo theina dingin châwlni chu iengtik âm a bo ding a na? Epha sukchîna, shekel suklien a, indik nawtaka hlêmna bûkna hmang a,
tangkaruoa mi rimsi inchawh a, mi tlasamhai chu kekawk bun khata inchawh a, busi ei zawr theina ding- in,” tiin.
LALPA chun Jakob ropuina sâlin ṭawng ân khâm a, “Matheiloin, an sinthaw hrim hrim theinghil dêr naw ning ah,” tiin.
Hi hi lei hin ram chu ân thinin, a sûnga um taphawthai chu an lungngai naw ding am a nih? Anih, Vadung ang chun hung lien vawng a ta, Aigupta ram Vadung angin hung buoiin hung kang a tih.
Chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a hril a, Chu nia chun, sûn changlai nisa intlâktir ka ta, nisa sat lai chun hnuoi chu sukthim ka tih.

In ruoiṭhehai chu lungngainaa le in hlahai po po chu ṭapnaah inchangtir ka tih; kâwng po po chu saiip puon indierkeitir ka ta, lu tin sîpa chun kâwkna hung intlungtir ka tih; chun, naupa khât nei sun ta dinga lungngaina ang le, a tâwpna chu khâkna ni angin siem ka tih.
Lalpa PATHIEN chun, “Ngai ta u, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk a nih, chuong nihaia chun rama chun ṭâm tir ka ta, bua ṭâmna ni loin, tuia ṭâmna ni loin, LALPA thu hrietnaa ṭâmna lem chu.
Chun, tuisuorieta inthawka tui- suorieta le hmâra inthawka saka khawm invâk an ta; LALPA thu chu zawng dingin kil tinah tlân an ta, hmu naw ni hai.
Chu nia chun nunghâk ṭha le tlangvâlhai chu dangchârin thidang an ta,

Samari khaw suolna sâla ṭawng inkhâm a, ‘Aw Dan, i Pathien a hring angin,’ le, ‘Beer-seba fena lampui a hring zing angin,’ tihai kha, chuong mihai khawm chu tlûng an tih, tho nâwk dêr naw ni hai,” tiin.
